raw akas.title: Are You the One? - Un esperimento d'amore

akas: Are You the One? - Un esperimento d'amore Italy
akas from release info: Are You the One? - Un esperimento d'amore Italy

1.title: Leap of Faith
1.plot: 22 singles take a leap of FATE and move into a house in Hawaii to try and pair up as 11 perfect matches and win, $1,000,000. Jealousy takes over when couples form quickly.

2.title: Flirt at Your Own Risk
2.plot: Zak provokes the wrath of Bria when he flirts with other women and the whole house gets pulled into the drama. Tevin and Kenya's player ways threaten their budding romance.

3.title: With Frenemies Like These
3.plot: Zak explores his options while the women fight each other for his attention. Kenya and Jasmine officially become enemies.

4.title: A Boyfriend by Any Other Name
4.plot: Asia is hurt when she learns what her friend and her crush did behind her back. Cali and Brett's budding romance is jeopardized by their own bad dating habits.

5.title: Extra-curricular Activities
5.plot: The house is shook when their exes show up to spend some quality time. Tension soars when one ex threatens to break up a power couple and another gets aggressive. Zak is torn between Bria and Morgan.

6.title: Spilling the Tea
6.plot: Kwasi starts drama when he lets slip what Tevin and Jasmine did the night before. Bria is angered by Morgan and Zak's developing relationship. The house makes some risky choices in picking their matches.

7.title: He Loves Me Not
7.plot: Cam starts to question his relationship with Kayla. Daniel's fun and games pushes Sam away. The house faces their most important Truth Booth, yet.

8.title: Beast Mode
8.plot: Picking up from last weeks cliffhanger, Zach and Bria go back to the house after a dramatic reveal and stir up some drama

9.title: I Want You to Want Me
9.plot: Nutsa crushes on Brett while Brett's inability to get over Cali has consequences for the entire house. Moe is pushed to start playing the game. Lewis reveals his true feelings to Asia.

10.title: Master Plan
10.plot: Bria's obsession with Zak and Zak's player ways threaten the house's ability to play the game. Cali comes up with a plan to find out which of the power couples are a Perfect Match and which are not.

11.title: Once Upon a Crazy Party Time
11.plot: At a wild party, questionable behavior turns best friends into best enemies. Tevin and Kenya get ready to learn their fate. Moe is pushed to step up his game.

12.title: Caught on Kiss Cam
12.plot: Kwasi and Jasmine's connection is put in jeopardy when a familiar foe makes a move on their relationship. Power couples try to make new connections.

13.title: This is Nuts-a
13.plot: Brett is put on the hot seat when he second guesses his feelings for Nutsa. The house is in crisis mode as they scramble to figure out the perfect matches.

14.title: It All Comes Down to This
14.plot: Asia attempts to sabotage Sam's relationship with Daniel. The house gets one final chance to win love and money and an extra day to deal with the fallout.

15.title: Reunion: The Final Matchup
15.plot: 22 cast members are secretly matched by matchmaking professionals. Throughout the course of the season, they must find their perfect match. Season 6 cast members became the first cast in history to accurately pair up all 11 couples. Will this happen again in season 7? Only time will tell.

1.title: You Can't Handle the Truth
1.plot: 10 single women are put through an extensive matchmaking process to find 10 guys who are their perfect match. All 20 are living together trying to figure out who is their match. If they do, they'll split a million dollar prize.

2.title: The Temptation of Chris T
2.plot: Chris T. jeopardizes the $1 million dollar prize with his inability to move on from Shanley. And when Ryan's journals go missing, he finds comfort in Kayla, who is also finding comfort in Wes.

3.title: A Real "G"
3.plot: Tensions explode between Jacy and Simone as both girls fight for John's affections.Things heat up when Brittany and Adam take a trip to the Boom-Boom Room. The challenge reveals embarrassing secrets about the girls' old habits.

4.title: Karma's a Bitch
4.plot: A challenge invites the guys' exes to dish dirt and spend the evening in the house. Brittany has trouble grasping the obvious message that Adam is not interested. Coleysia and Ashleigh ignite romances of their own.

5.title: Double Shot
5.plot: Tensions between John and Simone reach a boiling point. Kayla's interest in Wes in renewed even though she is still holding onto Ryan. Spirits are raised when a waterfall challenge sends two couples to the Truth Booth.

6.title: Turn the Paige
6.plot: The house conspires to figure out the next perfect couple. Kayla is called out for playing Ryan and Wes, while Simone tries to break up Chris T and Shanley for good. And a trip to the Truth Booth sends the house into chaos.

7.title: It's So Hard... To Say Goodbye
7.plot: The house is left reeling after Paige and Chris T are confirmed as a perfect match and sent to the Honeymoon Suite. Shanley is devastated by being separated from Chris T. And Kayla loses it when Ryan goes to comfort Jessica.

8.title: Getting Dumped On
8.plot: Kayla and Ryan get into a heated argument but the house turns on Kayla when she reveals sensitive information that threatens Amber's relationship with Ethan. A slippery challenge questions some couples ability to hang together.

9.title: White Party
9.plot: At the White Party the house lets loose and has fun, but John must come to terms with Jacy's growing feelings for Scali. A beach side challenge forces couples to get down and sandy.

10.title: Run Down with a Happy Ending
10.plot: The house tries to figure out how to use their last chances to find their perfect match and win the million dollars. Jacy confronts her feelings for Scali and John, as the house tries to solve the last remaining love triangle.

11.title: The Aftermatch
11.plot: The 20 cast members reunite with host Ryan Devlin for an intimate discussion of everything that happened in Hawaii. Includes never before seen footage, shocking revelations, and the dirt about which couples are still together.

12.title: Special Delivery
12.plot: The cast of AYTO reunites to celebrate the biggest event in Ethan and Amber's lives - a BABY! Find out what the cast has been up to as they spend one wild weekend together to throw an outrageous baby shower, AYTO-style.

1.title: One Too Many
1.plot: The house is faced with the final matchup ceremony and one switch to make. While the Truth Booth delivers some much needed answers, the question of the 11th girl puts the $1million in jeopardy.

2.title: The Truth Will Cost You
2.plot: Tensions flare as both Layton and Shelby become entangled in love triangles. The guys dig up dirt on the girls in a challenge that potentially leaves the 11th girl eligible for the truth booth.

3.title: Virgin Tears
3.plot: Tears are shed when Shelby brings her love triangle to an end. John tries to move in on Christina but keeps getting road blocked by Brandon, her no-match. The house is shocked to learn there is a virgin among them.

4.title: Loose Lips Sink Relationships
4.plot: A drunken mishap threatens to bring an end to the strongest couple in the house. Anthony swoops in on Layton's crush, Jenni. John finally makes a move on Christina. An unprecedented Matchup Ceremony leaves the house reeling.

5.title: Strap Those Boots Tight
5.plot: The house is shocked after the last Matchup Ceremony. Jenni believes that Layton is her match but fears the wrath of a devastated Jessica. For one couple, the Truth Booth threatens to bring even more heartbreak.

6.title: Parental Guidance
6.plot: The girls learn surprising information when their parents show up to interrogate the guys. When the parents leave, tensions between Layton and Anthony explode. The house learns that history can repeat itself.

7.title: Hot Salsa
7.plot: After another failed Matchup Ceremony, the house is ready for a fresh start. John believes he finally found his match in Jenni but the house isn't so sure. Ashley finds herself in a potentially explosive love triangle.

8.title: Dumped
8.plot: Dario and Laytons battle over Ashley intensifies. Ellie goes for Nathan but Nathan is convinced Christina is his match. Being the 11th girl gets too much for Christina.

9.title: Old Flames
9.plot: Despite not being a match, Nathan explodes when Christina returns to Brandon. With just two Matchup Ceremonies left, Ashley's indecision between Layton and Dario could keep the house from winning it all.

10.title: One Switch, One Glitch
10.plot: The house is faced with the final matchup ceremony and one switch to make. While the Truth Booth delivers some much needed answers, the question of the 11th girl puts the $1million in jeopardy.

11.title: The Aftermatch 2
11.plot: 21 cast mates reunite as host, Ryan Devlin, finds out if love lasted outside of Puerto Rico. All of the explosive drama that happened, after the final matchup ceremony lights went down, is revealed.

1.title: Once in a Lifetime Chance Brings Romance
1.plot: 20 singles arrive in Hawaii hoping to find their perfect match. But this time failure could cost them more than they ever imagined. Lust at first sight puts hearts on the line as couples and love triangles form quickly.

2.title: Can't Buy Me Love
2.plot: Couples are torn between playing 4 love and strategizing 2 win. The house decides to let a coin toss decide their fate. Can they turn 25 cents into $750,000?

3.title: Libido Limbo
3.plot: Potential new love interests get the cold shoulder when confirmed non-matches continue 2 hook-up. Hannah takes it personally when Kiki moves in on Chuck. The house gets called out 4 not moving on.

4.title: Mazed and Confused
4.plot: Non-matches continue to hook-up and threaten the house's chances of going 10 for 10. The house tries 2 let off steam but a Truth Booth blow-up and Match Up Ceremony breakdown proves that some will crack under the pressure.

5.title: The Little Merman
5.plot: Housemates lose their minds when they realize that their crush is moving on. Chuck is put on blast when the house witnesses him getting busy with another non-match. Chelsey is dead set on proving Connor is her match.

6.title: Getting Lei'd
6.plot: A wild luau reveals who is down 4 getting lei'd and who is getting played. Devin's jealousy causes him 2 flip his lid. Frustration grows when the guys bring strategy 2 the match-up ceremony.

7.title: Peanut Butter and Jealous
7.plot: Devin plays Kiki 4 a fool 2 get her back into his bed. Jealousy causes some 2 lose their cool. The house gets its flirt on as they try 2 find new romantic connections but some have better game than others.

8.title: Sorry Dad
8.plot: The girls are shocked when some of their exes show up 2 dish dirt. Kiki spills tea about her sex life w/Devin 2 the rest of the house. The girls rip into the guys 4 making selfish decisions at the match up.

9.title: Breaking Point
9.plot: After the rage-outs at the Ceremony caused by the three men failing to choose their Match with logic, the people are in a volatile state. Something has to break. A drastic is decision is made. How does this affect the game?

10.title: Never Give Up on Love
10.plot: Can the second match be confirmed? Can Devin figure out all 10 matches? Can he really not be a "$#!+head" anymore? Can Kiki finally lock her perfect match? Everyone needs to stick to the plan but can everyone withstand the pressure?

1.title: Perfect Match at First Sight
1.plot: 20 singles arrive in Hawaii to find love and win $1 million. There love-at-first sight instincts are put to the test, with an extra $250,000 at stake. A love triangle leads to an embarrassing Matchup Ceremony.

2.title: Punch Drunk Love
2.plot: John explodes when his relationship with Julia takes a turn. Asaf and Francesca's status is in question when a trip to the Boom Boom Room fails. Kaylen drops a bomb about her relationship with Gio that leaves the house shocked.

3.title: She Don't Want You
3.plot: John goes off when Stephen makes a play for Julia. Tori and Camille set their sights on the same guy. The pressure is on for the "golden couples" heading into the Truth Booth.

4.title: Three's a Crowd
4.plot: The house is thrown into turmoil when Gio and Kaylen's perfect relationship starts to fall apart. Asaf sleeps with the wrong person.

5.title: Beer Goggles
5.plot: The saga of Gio and Kaylen puts everyone on edge as Gio makes moves to pursue Julia, and every other girl in the house. Cam and Victoria have a night worth not remembering.

6.title: Mammas' Boys
6.plot: The guys reveal their soft sides when their moms reveal some embarrassing info. Stephen becomes increasingly paranoid over Gio's interest in Julia. Francesca gets caught in Gio's wolf den.

7.title: Pulling Punches
7.plot: An Adam and Eve party leads to jealousy as couples mix it up. A love hexagon forms and punches are thrown as John, Tyler, Stephen, and Gio try to make sense of their confused hearts.

8.title: Great Ex-pectations
8.plot: A cringe worthy challenge invites the guys' exes to dish some dirt. Gio and Stephen finally get the truth about Julia.

9.title: Third Eye Blind
9.plot: Old conflicts boil over to bring the house crumbling down when an epic fight leads to shock and tears. With just two Matchup Ceremonies left, the house desperately tries to strategize a win.

10.title: All or Nothing
10.plot: It's all or nothing as heading into the tenth and final Matchup Ceremony. Strategy leads the group to believe in one set of matches but, Asaf struggles between following his heart and being team player.

1.title: Find Love Win Money
1.plot: More couples means more chances for love, as 22 singles move into a house in the Dominican Republic to try and pair up as 11 perfect matches and win the largest cash prize in MTV history, $1,000,000.

2.title: Playing the Game and Getting Played
2.plot: Andre does a 180 when his relationship with Alicia hits the rocks. Gianna is torn between the nice guy and the bad boy. The house tries to follow their hearts but their hearts are all over the place

3.title: Butthurt
3.plot: Love quadrangles erupt and cause chaos in the house. Exes swap partners for some romantic alone time on the getaway date from hell. Tyler breaks Taylor's heart by making moves on multiple girls.

4.title: Tyranny of Love
4.plot: Tyranny convinces the house that she has found her match. Tyler's behavior opens the door for Andre to make his move on Taylor. Gianna and Hayden take their non-match relationship to the next level.

5.title: Sex, Lies, and Truth Booths
5.plot: Alicia betrays her friendship with Kam. A lie detector test puts Tyler on the spot in front of the entire house. Gianna strings Hayden along while sparks reignite with Michael.

6.title: No bro-code
6.plot: Distraught over learning about another non-match, Alicia moves in on someone else's man. Tyler's confession makes Shannon question his intentions. The guys best friends break bro-code and reveal some embarrassing secrets.

7.title: Party Hard, Love Harder
7.plot: Tensions between love triangles erupt at a Dominican Carnival blow out. Hayden and Carolina make moves towards a deeper relationship. The house grapples with how to deal with non-match couples.

8.title: Relationship Rehab
8.plot: Tensions erupt in the house when non-match couples stand their ground and refuse to separate. Things get serious between Hayden and Carolina, leaving Gianna heartbroken. The girls' exes don't live up to expectations.

9.title: Between a Rock and a Love Place
9.plot: An altercation during a house party threatens Michael's relationship with Kathryn. Strategy tries to tear couples apart and forces Shannon to choose between listening to the house or following her heart.

10.title: Eleven Is the Magic Number
10.plot: A desperate house has one more chance to win love and money. Kathryn and Ozzy reconnect. The house tries to open Hannah's eyes to the reality of her relationship.

11.title: The Final Matchup
11.plot: After weeks of searching for love and playing for money, Terrence J reunites the cast to get insider info on the explosive moments, spill tea on the unseen drama, and reveal what's gone down since leaving the house.

1.title: Swipe Right for Love
1.plot: 22 singles move into a house in New Orleans to try and pair up as 11 perfect matches and win, $1,000,000. As couples fall for each other hard and fast, love triangles form.

2.title: Shot Through the Heart
2.plot: Malcom's player ways cause trouble when he finds himself caught between Diandra and Nurys. Keith and Alexis try to break each other's hearts by dating other people.

3.title: Love in Limbo
3.plot: The strongest couples in the house are put on blast as people begin to question their connections. Michael shakes up the house by trying to break up multiple relationships.

4.title: Bae-trayl
4.plot: A game of harmless fun sends one couple to heartbreak city. Frustration grows between couples who are getting in too deep and singles who are struggling to make connections.

5.title: Jelly AF
5.plot: The house erupts into chaos when Kareem's attraction to Zoe pushes Alivia to tears. Everyone is on edge when the girls go with strategy during the Match Up Ceremony.

6.title: Don't Come at Me Crazy
6.plot: Jada rages when Uche calls her out for making moves on Clinton. Two on-again-off-gain couples are back on. The girls' families share some embarrassing info.

7.title: Sinking Relation-ships
7.plot: Nurys can't handle Malcolm and Diandra becoming a thing. The house is divided between ride-or-die couples who refuse to separate and singles who have a hard time making connections.

8.title: Ex-tra Cray
8.plot: Kareem and Alexis are pushed over the edge when Alivia and Keith explore the possibility that they're a Perfect Match. Exes arrive to spill some tea, including one ex that everyone already knows.

9.title: Tale of Two Players
9.plot: Paranoia sets in when Audrey sees Michael making a connection with Geles. Malcolm faces the music for his player ways and the house starts to explore new connections.

10.title: No Love in NOLA
10.plot: Jealousy takes center stage at a wild Mardi Gras party. Geles becomes enemy number one when she makes moves on multiple guys in the house. Dimitri gets on Jada's bad side.

11.title: Love by the Numbers
11.plot: Tyler hopes to move out of the Friendzone with Nicole. Shad shows some emotions. Heartbreak and jealousy hang over the house as they turn to Keith in hopes of strategizing a win.

12.title: Playing with Fire
12.plot: With the final Match Up Ceremony ahead, the house is desperate to get the right couples into the Truth Booth and pair up as 11 Perfect Matches. Keith and Alexis push each other over the edge.

13.title: Reunion: The Final Matchup Part 1
13.plot: After weeks of searching for love and playing for money, the Season 6 cast reunites to give insider info on the explosive moments, spill tea on the unseen drama, and reveal what's gone down since leaving the house.

14.title: Reunion: The Final Matchup Part 2
14.plot: After weeks of searching for love and playing for money, the Season 6 cast reunites to give insider info on the explosive moments, spill tea on the unseen drama, and reveal what's gone down since leaving the house.

1.title: Episode #8.1
1.plot: Male and female contestants stay for 10 weeks in a holiday destination to win $1 million and hopefully find love.

-1.title: Beyond the Boom Boom Room
-1.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

imdb.plot outline: 10 women and 10 men try to seek out love in a 10 week stay at this house all together in Hawaii where true love is really put to the test. Along the way couples go into this thing called a truth booth to find out if they are a "perfect match" or "no match" at all.
imdb.title: Are You the One?
plot: Male and female contestants stay for 10 weeks in a holiday destination to win $1 million and hopefully find love.::Alicia Jayne

10 women and 10 men try to seek out love in a 10 week stay at this house all together in Hawaii where true love is really put to the test. Along the way couples go into this thing called a truth booth to find out if they are a "perfect match" or "no match" at all.
